name: Flippin' Second Hand Jesus
description:
Flippin' Second Hand Jesus is an ACTION SHOP MANAGEMENT game for VR!

Action packed! How many days can you SURVIVE?!

I've used HTC Vive for development and I want to know...

DOES it WORK on other VR sets?

Help me improve the game. PLAY THE ALPHA NOW! And write comments here!

Tistou Makes Games -ALL EPISODES- for FREE on Youtube!
